title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: The dialog details have a duplicated name validation issue on the first page. Additionally, the first and second columns need to be merged.
OB:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog appears, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog appears oversized for methods with many parameters.
EB: The dialog details should perform proper validation for duplicate names on the first page. The first and second columns should be merged.
SR: The preview gets cut off when changing a parameter name to something very long.
